description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: Dromoka's followers forsake blood ties so that they may join a greater family.
name: Dragonlord Dromoka

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Dragonlord Ojutai

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: Silumgar never passes up an oppurtunity to add to his opulence.
name: Dragonlord Silumgar
rules:
Flying; deathtouch; 
When Dragonlord Silumgar enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Dragonlord Silumgar.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Dragonlord Kolaghan

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Dragonlord Atarka
rules:
Flying; trample;
When Dragonlord Atarka enters he battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Dromoka's Command
rules:
Choose two-  

*Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn.  

*Target Player sacrifices an enchantment.  

*Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.  

*Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Ojutai's Command
rules:
Choose two -  

* Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.  

* You gain 4 life.  

* Counter target creature spell.  

* Draw a card.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Silumgar's Command
rules:
Choose two -  

* Counter target noncreature spell.  

* Return target permanent to its owner's hand.  

* Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.  

* Destroy target planeswalker.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Kolaghan's Command
rules:
Choose two -  

* Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.  

* Target player discards a card.  

*Destroy target artifact.  

* Kolaghan's Comman deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Atarka's Command
rules:
Choose two -  

* Your opponents can't gain life this turn.  

* Atarka's Command deals 3 damage to each opponent.  

* You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.  

* Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain reach until end of turn.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.
name: Enduring Scalelord
rules:
Flying; 
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: "That which is beautiful in form can also be deadly."
name: Cunning Breezedancer
rules:
Flying; 
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cunning Breezedancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: "Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts."  - Silumgar, translated from Draconic
name: Ruthless Deathfang
rules:
Flying; 
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Swift Warkite
rules:
Flying; 
When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or gaveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Savage Ventmaw
rules:
Flying; 
Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add RRRGGG to your mana pool. Until end of turn, this mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: Though she stood alone, she struck with the force of an army.
name: Surge of Righteouness
rules: Destroy target black or red creature that's attacking or blocking. You gain 2 life.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Encase in Ice
rules:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)  
Enchant red or green creature; 
When Encase in Ice enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: "Worse than watching the cruelest deed is watching it done by your own hand."  -Baihir, Dromoka mage
name: Self-Inflicted Wound
rules: Target opponent sacrifices a green or white creature. If that player does, he or she loses 2 life.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: The sky offers few hiding places.
name: Rending Volley
rules:
Rending Volley can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Display of Dominance
rules:
Choose one -  

-Destroy target blue or black noncreature permanent.  

-Permanents you control can't be the targets of blue of black spells your opponents control this turn.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Glaring Aegis

description: this field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: "Still the mind and quiet the heart. Only then will ou hear the Multiverse's great truths." -Narset
name: Mystic Meditation
rules: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a creature card.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: Foul-Tongue shamans draw their powers from a dark twisting of the Draconic language.
name: Foul-Tongue Shriek
rules: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
name: Sabertooth Outrider
rules:
Trample;
Formidable - Whenever Sabertooth Outrider attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Sabertooth Outrider gains first strike until end of turn.

description: This field does not apply to MTG cards!
flavor: The remains of ancient civilizations litter the run-down land.
name: Naturalize
rules: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
